property.value: Ċ: Reveal any number of creature cards with power 5 or greater from your hand. Add Ĉ to your mana pool for each card revealed this way.

property.value: Her connection to the gargantuans puts her in line to become Anima, a sacred but daunting duty.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Viashino thrashes are led by elders who have survived countless challenges.

property.value: Ċ: Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forget. Only then will there be space for hope between the pain and fear."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rigorous faith and belief are rewarded on occasion, and richly so.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spearbreaker Behemoth is indestructible. 1: Target creature with power 5 or greater is indestructible this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few Nayans dare hunt the gargantuans. They're regarded not as animals but as forces of nature, like landslides or typhoons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1: Put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield. +1: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. -8: You get an emblem with "Artifacts, creatures, enchantments, and lands you control are indestructible."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An avatar he sculpts of instinct and force.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card and/or a land card from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature card in your graveyard has unearth 2Ć. (2Ć: Return the card to the battlefield. The creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He bids his minions rise from their graves to their knees.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2Ĉ, Ċ, Sacrifice a red creature, a green creature, and a white creature: Search your library for a card named Godsire and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mine is an insatiable god, with appetites as magnificent as the jungle itself."

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1Ć, Discard a card: Regenerate Viashino Skeleton.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Underneath the Dregscape lay the remains of creatures long extinct from Grixis.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both — Branching Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature with flying; and/or Branching Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lightning lives in everything, in living flesh and growing things. It must be set free."—Rakka Mar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sharuum the Hegemon enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To gain audience with the hegemon, one must bring a riddle she has not heard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On our thirty-fourth day of digging, we unearthed a chamber that contained the intact remains of several species long extinct from Grixis. One in particular should make a fine siege engine . . . ."—Last notes of Shungus Nod, fleshcrafter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Unearth 2ą (2ą: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.value: ć: Undead Leotau gets +1/-1 until end of turn. Unearth 2Ć (2Ć: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Draw a card. If damage would be dealt to you, prevent that damage. Exile a card from your graveyard for each 1 damage prevented this way. When there are no cards in your graveyard, you lose the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sigil of Distinction enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each charge counter on Sigil of Distinction. Equip—Remove a charge counter from Sigil of Distinction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2ą, Ċ, Sacrifice a white creature, a blue creature, and a black creature: Search your library for a card named Sphinx Sovereign and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He calls a riddle through the gaps of cloven clouds, hoping for an answer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblet was a gift from the sphinx Gorael, who hoped humans and vedalken would eventually destroy each other to acquire it, leaving all of Esper to her own kind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ: Add 1 to your mana pool. 1, Ċ, Sacrifice Bant Panorama: Search your library for a basic Forest, Plains, or Island card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bant's hearts are as pure as its air and as bright as its skies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Count the number of cards in your library. Your life total becomes that number.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bantians believe those who are born into the highest caste and live a life of discipline and virtue can ascend to become angels.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has deathtouch. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half his or her life, rounded up. Equip 3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — Destroy target artifact; or put target creature on the bottom of its owner's library; or counter target instant spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bant is a world where death and chaos hold no sway.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target card from a graveyard. You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The future is a snake, devouring your life backwards through time. And when you die, believe me, it doesn't stop feeding."—Sedris, the Traitor King

property.name: Rules
property.value: Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control. Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each mutation causes the incurables to look vastly different from one another. They are left with only one thing in common: their insatiable lust for the slaughter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sanctum Gargoyle enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As their supplies of etherium dwindled, mechanists sent gargoyles farther and farther afield in search of salvage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ: Add 1 to your mana pool. 1, Ċ, Sacrifice Jund Panorama: Search your library for a basic Swamp, Mountain, or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sky is the dragon's throne, the seat from which it issues its fiery decrees.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2Ć, Ċ, Sacrifice a blue creature, a black creature, and a red creature: Search your library for a card named Prince of Thralls and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May these deaths be the first of many."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some believe the spiky crystal called sangrite is concentrated dragon's breath. Others think it's crystallized life energy. The clans care only about the power it unleashes when crushed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player taps a Mountain, Forest, or Plains for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He watches over the valley where Progenitus sleeps, culling signs from its steaming breaths.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She stands ready, always watchful, knowing that weeks of peace and serenity can be overturned by a single distant sail.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Corpse Connoisseur enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card and put that card into your graveyard. If you do, shuffle your library. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Esper, like any work of art, can be truly appreciated only from a distance."—Tezzeret

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Knight-Captain of Eos enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield. Ą, Sacrifice a Soldier: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The strength of Bant's caste system is the unfailing loyalty of its meekest members.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach If a creature is attacking you and you control a Forest and a Plains, you may cast Qasali Ambusher without paying its mana cost and as though it had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The surprise of a battle cry can be as deadly as a blade.

property.value: Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.) property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me your memories, and you will have release from the suffering they bring you."

property.value: Whenever a creature with power 5 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may put two +1/+1 counters on it.

property.value: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even in single combat, I am never alone."—Rafiq of the Many

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Ċ: Target creature with power 5 or greater gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Naya's celebrants stoke the gargantuans into a rage, loosing a tide of muscle with the precision of an arrow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arcane Sanctum enters the battlefield tapped. Ċ: Add Ą, ą, or Ć to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must rely on our own knowledge, not on the dogma of the seekers or the mutterings of the sphinxes."—Tullus of Palandius

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell that targets you or a permanent you control. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries of careful practice have elevated the casting of protective spells to an art form. What little offensive magic remains on Bant stands little chance of breaching them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Blister Beetle enters the battlefield, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Warriors of the Rip Clan wear their beetle-acid scars proudly, even modifying clothing and armor to better display the trophy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever an artifact creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may put a 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether mechanical or biological, life finds a way to propagate itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The island nation of Jhess is under constant siege from Valeron on the mainland. Riders traverse the coastline, always on the lookout for sails or aven.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each sigil marks the recognition of a great deed and signifies a duty owed to the one who granted it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is why we don't go out in banewasp weather."—Rannon, Vithian holdout

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 5 or greater, you may draw a card. Ċ: Add 1 to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I feel the vine-rhythm as my friends drive the beast to me. I will not miss my mark."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Glaze Fiend gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before the zealots of the Ethersworn came to power, Esper illusionists dreamed up creations to mimic a variety of substances.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Steelclad Serpent can't attack unless you control another artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the highest towers to the deepest sea, all life must be touched by etherium."—Lodus of the Ethersworn

property.value: "The dragon has no pretense of compassion, no false mask of civilization—just hunger, heat, and need."—Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Players can't untap more than one creature during their untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the most battle-hardened soldiers pause in her presence for a moment of introspection.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblin lairs sit high in Jund's mountains. This gives the goblins easy access to the sacrificial peaks above and lets them build up a head of steam before attacking prey down below.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would lose the game, instead shuffle your hand, your graveyard, and all permanents you own into your library, then draw seven cards and your life total becomes 20.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It shows not what you are but what you were.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Change the target of target spell with a single target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We can't beat the necromancers in numbers or raw power. We must beat them with ingenuity and timing."—Rannon, Vithian holdout

property.value: Trample Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.value: Ċ: Add ć, Ĉ, or Ą to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although the Anima herself remains at the Sacellum, her druids roam Naya, collecting mana bonds with every location in the world.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We of the Sanctum Arcanum have pondered every word on every page of the Filigree Texts. If you can't say the same, don't bother speaking."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Both guide and guard on open plain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1ć: Cavern Thoctar gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Natives of Naya know better than to loiter near the mouth of a cave. Two glowing red eyes and the stench of foul breath are all the warning you're likely to get.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player who has cast a nonartifact spell this turn can't cast additional nonartifact spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The noble work of our order is to infuse all life on Esper with etherium. Our goal will be reached more rapidly if new life is . . . suppressed."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Kederekt Creeper can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bloated with venom, it crawls Grixis looking for victims to ooze onto.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every once in a while, when they aren't getting incinerated in lava, crushed under rock slides, or devoured by dragons, goblins experience moments of unmitigated glory in battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1Ą, Ċ: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature with power 5 or greater this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gargantuans die not in moments but in moons. There is still time to aid this noble ancient."

property.value: "It's free to do whatever it wants. I've merely told it what that is."—Xorin, Architect of Will

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

property.value: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

property.value: Like most features of Grixis, the obelisks that remain from the time of Alara now exist only for dark exploitation.

property.value: From her sunsail tent high above the forest floor, an elf harkener can hear the footfalls of a single creature through the cacophony of Naya's jungle sounds.

property.value: At sea, the Jhessian fleet strikes swiftly and decisively. On land, facing the elite cavalry of Valeron, its marines must rely on more cautious strategies.

property.value: A dragon's death is almost as feared as its life. Old, dying dragons throw themselves into volcanoes, causing massive upheaval and widespread disaster.

property.value: Flying Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scullers beneath Esper keep strixes as trained pets, and set them loose when a fare refuses to pay.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What you are attempting is not against the law. It is, however, extremely foolish."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Realm Razer enters the battlefield, exile all lands. When Realm Razer leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The behemoth roared, and the world was blasted free of empires and tyrants.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player gains 7 life and draws two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a year, Akrasa holds a joust that draws knights and their leotaus from every nation on Bant. The prize is an Akrasan sigil, but the true reward is the angel's kiss.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Broodmate Dragon enters the battlefield, put a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Frozen in fear, the goblins stared upward at the circling hunter—and were promptly eaten by its diving mate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.) Ĉ: Thorn-Thrash Viashino gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play with the top card of your library revealed. As long as the top card of your library is an artifact or creature card, Skill Borrower has all activated abilities of that card. (If any of the abilities use that card's name, use this creature's name instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Algae Gharial.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It lurks just under the surface, using the algae-choked tar pits of Jund as both home and hunting blind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay 2. If you do, put a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield. That token has haste and "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this permanent."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To crack a mirror is to provide an opening for the reflection to escape.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenger Drake.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragons consider drakes to be mockeries of their perfection, destroying them on sight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skeleton creatures you control and other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the necromancer barons, killing and recruitment are one and the same.
